This MOD adds a storage room with extra treasure boxes and a planetarium room in your breezehome.
---------Attention---------
Please be sure to use the /Breezehome-Hearthfire CTD fix/ If you use if Hearthfire.
descriptionHtml:
---------Attention---------
Please be sure to use the "Breezehome-Hearthfire CTD fix" If you use if Hearthfire.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27053
------------------------------
This MOD adds a storage room with extra treasure boxes and a planetarium room in your breezehome.
--optionfile(Overwrite)--
this optional file makes room bright. please use this file by overwriting　if you feel the room dark.

The purposes of this MOD are;
1. Stashing all your stuff in one box makes it hard to look for things. Having a few boxes lets you sort them as you will.
2. When you want to display your favourite equipments, you would use a mannequin. But as the number of mannequins grow, it makes it longer to load.
　　Instead of using mannequins, this MOD allows you to display screenshots on the wall like photo frames to prevent slowdown.
　　To replace the number on the photo frame, replace the file with the corresponding number with your image, adjusted to the same size to the original.
　　NOTE: Your image will be slightly stretched vertically.
3. This MOD also adds a planetarium room that lets you take a look at a beautiful image of the space. No purpose, really.
4. The table looked somewhat empty, so added a map and a statue. Just because I can.

-----Installation-----
Manually copy & paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
It's generally in C:Program Files (x86)Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data
-----Uninstallation-----
Just delete any files from this mod.
-----Credits-----
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17423
author: likeoptimusa
